collections.title: Landsat mosaic (bi-monthly, v1.0.1)
collections.description: Global, cloud-free, and reconstructed historical Landsat spectral bands are provided at a spatial resolution of 30 meters and temporal resolution of bimonthly intervals from 1997 onwards. The dataset was generated using the GLAD Landsat ARD version 2 as the primary input for temporal aggregation and the imputation of missing values.

collections.title: Vegetation Phenology and Productivity parameters, yearly, UTM projection
collections.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Copernicus High Resolution Land Vegetation Phenology and Productivity parameters at 10m on yearly basis from 2017 onwards for EU countries. This collection contains parameters of the first detected growing season.

collections.title: Vegetation Phenology and Productivity parameters, yearly, UTM projection
collections.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Copernicus High Resolution Land Vegetation Phenology and Productivity parameters at 10m on yearly basis from 2017 onwards for EU countries. This collection contains parameters for season 2.

collections.title: Seasonal PPI Trajectories, 10-daily, UTM projection
collections.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Plant phenology index (PPI) at 10m resolution for EU.

collections.title: Global landcover at 10m resolution for 2020.
collections.description: WorldCover provides global land cover products for 2020 at 10 m resolution, developed and validated in near-real time based on Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 data.

collections.title: Global landcover at 10m resolution for 2021.
collections.description: WorldCover provides global land cover products for 2021 at 10 m resolution, developed and validated in near-real time based on Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 data.

collections.title: Vegetation Indices, daily, UTM projection
collections.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Vegetation Indices (VI) at 10m resolution.

collections.title: Sentinel-2 L1C
collections.description: SENTINEL-2 is a wide-swath, high-resolution, multi-spectral imaging mission, supporting Copernicus Land Monitoring studies, including the monitoring of vegetation, soil and water cover, as well as observation of inland waterways and coastal areas. The SENTINEL-2 Multispectral Instrument (MSI) samples 13 spectral bands: four bands at 10 metres, six bands at 20 metres and three bands at 60 metres spatial resolution.

collections.title: Sentinel-2 L2A
collections.description:
SENTINEL-2 is a wide-swath, high-resolution, multi-spectral imaging mission, supporting Copernicus Land Monitoring studies, including the monitoring of vegetation, soil and water cover, as well as observation of inland waterways and coastal areas. The SENTINEL-2 Multispectral Instrument (MSI) samples 13 spectral bands: four bands at 10 metres, six bands at 20 metres and three bands at 60 metres spatial resolution.
 The level 2A data is atmospherically corrected using Sen2Cor.

collections.title: Sentinel-1 SAR GRD: C-band Synthetic Aperture Radar Ground Range Detected.
collections.description: The Sentinel-1 mission provides data from a dual-polarization C-band Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) instrument. This collection includes the S1 Ground Range Detected (GRD) scenes, processed to a calibrated, ortho-corrected product. This collection is compatible with "sar_backscatter" and "ard_normalized_radar_backscatter" processes.

collections.title: Copernicus Global 30 meter Digital Elevation Model dataset.
collections.description: Copernicus Global 30 meter Digital Elevation Model dataset.

collections.title: Landsat 8 level 2 ARD, European Coverage
collections.description:
Landsat-8 OLI/TIRS L2SP refers to the Level-2 Surface Reflectance product acquired by the Operational Land Imager (OLI) and Thermal Infrared Sensor (TIRS) instrument on board Landsat 8 satellite. This product is derived from the Landsat-8 OLI/TIRS L1T or L1TP product and is generated using atmospheric correction algorithms to remove atmospheric effects and convert the top-of-atmosphere reflectance to surface reflectance values.

 This is Landsat 8 Collection 2 European Coverage, so does not correspond to the full Landsat archive.

bands.description: Emissivity of Band 10 estimated from ASTER GED

collections.title: Daily global Sentinel-3 Synergy products at 300m resolution combining OCLI and SLSTR bands.
collections.description:
[Experimental] Sentinel-3  SYNERGY products are created from a combination of OLCI and SLSTR Level-1B products (including both
nadir and oblique views). The SYNERGY swath is then corresponding to the common area between OLCI
and SLSTR swaths, restricted to the daylight part of the SENTINEL-3 orbit (i.e., where the sun zenith angle
at satellite ground track is lower than 80Â°).

collections.title: Daily global Sentinel-3 Land surface temperature at 1km resolution
collections.description:
*Experimental* Daily global Sentinel-3 land surface temperature at 1km resolution. Land surface temperature is defined as the effective radiometric temperature of the Earth's surface "skin" in the instrument field of view. Here, "skin" is referring to the top surface in bare soil conditions and to the effective emitting temperature of vegetation "canopies" as determined from a view of the top of a canopy.
 This product is derived from the SLSTR (Sea and Land Surface Temperature Radiometer) instrument on board the Sentinel-3 satellite.

 Multiple observations may be available per day, we recommend temporal aggregation to create daily composites.

bands.description: quality control flags including summary_cloud flag

collections.title: Sentinel 1 Monthly Mosaics
collections.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Sentinel-1 monthly mosaics are generated from monthly stacks of Sentinel-1 GRD data by calculating the weighted sum of the terrain corrected backscatter observations. Two different Sentinel-1 mosaics are being produced for each month: IW mosaic and DH mosaic.

collections.title: Sentinel-3 OLCI Land Full Resolution (NRT)
collections.description: This collection provides Sentinel-3 OLCI Level-2 Land Full Resolution products containing data on global vegetation, chlorophyll, and water vapor.

bands.description: Fraction of Absorbed Photosynthetically Active Radiation (FAPAR) in the plant canopy
Total amount of water vapour integrated over an atmosphere column
Estimates of the Chlorophyll content in terrestrial vegetation, aims at monitoring vegetation condition and health

By-products of the GI-FAPAR, the so-called red and NIR rectified reflectances are virtual reflectance largely decontaminated from atmospheric and angular effects, and good proxy to Top of Canopy reflectances.

By-products of the GI-FAPAR, the so-called red and NIR rectified reflectances are virtual reflectance largely decontaminated from atmospheric and angular effects, and good proxy to Top of Canopy reflectances.

collections.title: Sentinel-3 OLCI Water Full Resolution (NRT)
collections.description: OLCI Level 2 Marine products provide spectral information on the colour of the oceans (water reflectances). These radiometric products are used to estimate geophysical parameters e.g. estimates of phytoplankton biomass through determining the Chlorophyll-a (Chl) concentration. In coastal areas, they also allow monitoring of the sediment load via the Total Suspended Matter (TSM) product. Full resolution products are at a nominal 300m resolution.

collections.title: Sentinel-3 SYNERGY Aerosol Optical Depth
collections.description: This Collection provides the Sentinel-3 Synergy Level-2 Aerosol Optical Depth product, which is a downstream development of the Sentinel-2 Level-1 OLCI FR and SLSTR Radiances and Brightness Temperatures products. The dataset provides both retrieved and diagnostic global aerosol parameters at super-pixel (4.5 km x 4.5 km) resolution for all regions over land and ocean free of snow/ice cover, excluding high cloud fraction data.
